metadata.title: 2002 (Feb. - March) U.S. Echo Integration-trawl Survey Data for Walleye Pollock (Theragra chalcogramma) on the Southeastern Bering Sea Shelf and Southeastern Aleutian Basin (Cruise ID: MF2002-03)
metadata.description: The primary cruise objective for the Bering Sea shelf section was to assess abundance and distribution of pollock inhabiting the eastern portion of the Steller sea lion Conservation Area (SCA) east of 168°W. The primary objective of the Bogoslof portion was to assess the abundance and distribution of pre-spawning pollock in the southeastern Aleutian Basin.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: The primary cruise objective for the Bering Sea shelf section was to assess abundance and distribution of pollock inhabiting the eastern portion of the Steller sea lion Conservation Area (SCA) east of 168°W. The primary objective of the Bogoslof portion was to assess the abundance and distribution of pre-spawning pollock in the southeastern Aleutian Basin.
